name: Police Arrive Every 10 Seconds
description:
You’re a bank robber. Take your gun and make some money.

How To Play

  • You can interact with safe box and get a money bag
  • Throw your money bag in the car zone
  • You will get money after car leave
  • You can stand in car zone to run away when car leave
  • You can upgrade your skill after running away
Control
  • Move: W / A / S / D, Up / Down / Left /Right
  • Left Mouse Button: Fire / Throw item which on your hand
  • Interact with item: Holding E
